2009/2/11 David Saff <david@...>:
> OK, we've moved JUnit hosting to github. Next up is issue tracking. Any
> favorites out there? Easy URLs are a big win for me (
> http://somesite.com/junit/bugs/119989 or some such). Thanks,
>
> David Saff
>

I'm quite a big fan of JIRA. Codehaus might be an option for the
hosting, or you could speak to someone at Atlassian. I understand that
they make their software available in some form for open-source
projects. I'd suggest test driving at Codehaus [2] or Apache [3] to
see if you like the interface.

I've also used Launchpad and Trac, but JIRA is my favourite of those three.

Cheers,

James

[1] http://www.atlassian.com/software/jira/
[2] http://jira.codehaus.org
[3] http://issues.apache.org/jira/
